hero.headline: XYZ Rental - Eco-Friendly Car Rentals
hero.description: Sustainable and reliable car rentals for the environmentally conscious traveler. Drive green with confidence.

about.title: About XYZ Rental
about.content: XYZ Rental is committed to providing eco-friendly transportation solutions. We believe in sustainable travel and offer a fleet of hybrid and electric vehicles to reduce environmental impact while maintaining the quality service you expect.

metadata.title: XYZ Rental - Eco-Friendly Car Rentals
metadata.description: Sustainable car rentals with hybrid and electric vehicles. Drive green with XYZ Rental.
